text_block_list.text: The meeting lasted so long, that Taiki Shuttle's training time had come to an end…!
And so, I headed to the training course. Taiki Shuttle was standing there and looked really depressed…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Uu… UuuuUuu~…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ah…!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaaaah!! Trainer-saaaaaaaaaaan!!
(fieldaaaaaam!!)
…The tearful hug she gave me, was more like an intense tackle.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hicc, hic…
choice_data_list: Have you calmed down a bit…?
Have you calmed down a bit…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yeah… Trainer-san, I'm sorry for surprising you like that.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'm, really bad at being lonely… I just get more and more depressed, and can't help but start crying…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Today, while I was training with my friends, I was completely fine when we were talking…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: But one by one, everyone started heading home… I was left behind… Trainer-san wasn't here either…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Uu… hicc…!!
She was constantly surrounded by her friends normally, but it seemed that she became considerably lonely when left on her own…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hicc, hic… oh?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …Sorry. I cried alot, but now it looks like that made me really hungry.
choice_data_list: Let's go get something good to eat

text_block_list.text: Since I was late and wasn't there for her training, as an apology, I took Taiki Shuttle with me to a family restaurant.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, a family restaurant!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Lots on the menu! Lots of drinks!! I really like this place!!
choice_data_list: Go ahead and order whatever you want
Go ahead and order whatever you want

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Really?! Trainer-san, you're kind of a fatty aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …Oh, was that a rude way to put it? Sorry, um… a real glutton!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: What should I get…?! Steak? Hamburger? Special deluxe parfait…?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …I'll get all of them!!
I let her eat until she was completely satsified.
…For now, I'll ignore the fact that my wallet has gotten alot thinner.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Puhaa!! Thank you, Trainer-san! I'm so happy, now that I'm full!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: But, well, Japan's steak is a little on the small side, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: The steak I've eaten with my family is twice… no, 3 times as thick!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …How nostalgic. I used to talk alot with my friends and family while eating…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Everyone… I want to see them again…
Taiki Shuttle slowly became more dejected. For someone who gets lonely easily like her, the bitterness of being home sick must be pretty severe…
choice_data_list: So you don't get lonely, I'll be here
So you don't get lonely, I'll be here

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …!! Trainer-san…!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …Thank you!! Thank you very much!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'm not going home any time soon! At least not until I win the Twinkle Series!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: For the family and friends I love, who all cheered me on.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: When I win, they always show me their happy smiles!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Seeing everyone with happy smiles is my favorite! For me, that's the thing that makes me the happiest!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's why… even if I get lonely, I'm going to do my best!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: With Trainer-san here, I can keep doing my best!!
choice_data_list: Yeah, let's both do our best!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes!! Let's make them show us their happy smiles, together!
And with these renewed feelings, Taiki Shuttle and I would aim for victory…!
…however.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ahhh! That's Dober over there!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdy, my frieeeeeeeeend!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Eh? What…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Doberrrrrrr~~~!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Wai- Kyaa?!
(Baaaaaaaaam!!)
…looks like Taiki Shuttle still has a long, long way to go.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry~☆
